title: Review: 'Amanecer,' Bomba Estereo
teaser: The Colombian party band, Bomba Estereo, is out with their latest album, Amanecer. NPR reviewer Banning Eyre, senior editor at afropop.org, says it offers a friendly entr√©e into the realm of electronic dance music with folk roots.
